name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kid Goku with Shenron: Iconic Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Relive the magic of *Dragon Ball* with this dynamic live wallpaper featuring *Kid Goku* and the mighty *Shenron*!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This vibrant live wallpaper showcases the young Goku summoning the legendary dragon Shenron, surrounded by glowing Dragon Balls and an aura of energy. Watch as the iconic scene comes to life, adding excitement and nostalgia to your browser. Perfect for *Dragon Ball* fans or anyone who loves iconic anime moments.

Along with the action-packed animation, popular site shortcuts for quick access, and a real-time date and time display. Download now and bring the adventure of *Dragon Ball* to your Chrome browser!
